contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 17, 1887 D Newcastle Contest
Newcastle Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Newcastle upon Tyne Contest newcastle-contest
Exhibition Park, Newcastle 14 bands competed. Contest associated with the Newcastle Jubilee Exhibition. Prizes: £30 and 12 guinea cornet, £20 and 11 guinea baritone, £15 and 7 guinea trombone, £10, £5
Dec. 31, 2011, 10:13 p.m. Nov. 7, 2017, 12:12 p.m.
